text: "The Rose Song" is a song written and performed by American singer-songwriter and actress Olivia Rodrigo. It was released as part of the soundtrack album High School Musical: The Musical: The Series: The Soundtrack: Season 2. The song appears in the second season episode "Yes, And" from High School Musical: The Musical: The Series. The song was released on June 18, 2021, and received positive reviews from critics. It was also nominated for an MTV Movie & TV Award for Best Musical Moment. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Olivia Rodrigo songs
title: The Rose Song
